actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit certain RTC asset sales.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to prohibit the Resolution Trust Corporation from selling the assets of a failed financial institution to persons who engaged in certain activities including defaulting on an obligation exceeding $1,000,000 to a failed institution and proposing to purchase the assets through the Corporation or an insured institution under its jurisdiction.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit certain RTC asset sales.
